cards.buttonText: PITCH IN TO OUR TIP JAR

sections: In the new episode of our  weekly podcast
, David Sirota sits down with freshman Rep.

(D-Alaska), who recently made history as the first woman elected to represent Alaska in the House of Representatives, and the first Democrat to represent the state in the lower chamber in almost 50 years (12:40).

David speaks with Mary about how she pulled off her historic win, why she opposed forcing the railroad unions to accept the contract brokered by the Biden administration, and Alaska‚Äôs economic dependency on the oil and gas industry in the face of climate change.
A rough transcript of the episode is available
If you like this episode, feel free to pitch into the tip jar ‚Äî it helps us do this kind of reporting:
We hope you enjoy our weekly podcast ‚Äî it‚Äôs the next step in our plan to build a powerful independent voice to take on corporate media.
